thread.title: Foo Fighters 'set to announce' Glastonbury appearance at secret Somerset show
thread.title_full: Foo Fighters 'set to announce' Glastonbury appearance at secret Somerset show

author: Jennifer ruby
title: Foo Fighters 'set to announce' Glastonbury appearance at secret Somerset show
text:
Foo Fighters ‘set to announce’ Glastonbury appearance at secret Somerset show 
The US rockers appear to have sent out secret invites to a concert on Friday night Friday 24 February 2017 11:21 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Big reveal? The Foo Fighters are performing a secret gig on Friday night Larry Busacca/Getty 
Foo Fighters are expected to announce that they will be headlining Glastonbury at a surprise gig. 
The US rockers, who have been teasing fans about their involvement for weeks, are expected to make the big reveal during a show in Somerset on Friday night. 
A number of fans who signed up to the band’s newly-launched Obelisk Airlines website have received mysterious invites to a secret concert at The Cheese and Grain in Frome. 
The venue issued a statement, which read: “We have a strictly private event at the Cheese & Grain this Friday 24th February. Anyone doubting any foo fighters news there's your answer @TheGlastoThingy pic.twitter.com/sd61nQcxIq — Man With Beard (@RyanHudson2009) February 23, 2017 
“There will be no tickets available at all to anyone who has not already been invited. Please do not come to the venue as we are unable to assist with any admission requests and we will be closed to the public all day.” 
Foo Fighters were set to headline the Worthy Farm festival back in 2015 but were forced to pull out when frontman Dave Grohl broke his leg. Celebrity style at Glastonbury 2016 - in pictures Celebrity style at Glastonbury 2016 - in pictures 1/32 Glastonbury 2016 
Millie Mackintosh (wearing American Eagle Outfitters), Whinnie Williams, Portia Freeman and Daisy Lowe wearing Converse Tabatha Fireman/Getty
